name: Climbing Therapy
description:
"Ronaldo, I don't think I can do this anymore. I need space."

"No, Millicent, we can work this out. Please."

Bonded together through rope and a failing relationship, they must reach the summit.

For 1-2 local players with WASD and arrow controls.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
